title: Very simple Yasuo change to make him more balanced
body:
Very simple. He effectively has two passives, right? His doubled crits and shield? Here's the proposed change:

**Shift one of them as a passive he gains upon leveling his W once instead of giving him 2 innates.** That way, he'll be more manageable early. Thematically, the shield would make more sense as his W 's passive as they're 'defensive'. Could also put the crit passive on E so Level 1 Yasuo will be a little weaker.

Bonus:
This could be added along with or Riot could choose to implement just this one or the previous one.
**Windwall now has a limited number of projectiles it can block before disappearing**, kind of like {{champion:201}} wall but with more 'health'. Maybe the number of shots it can take can increase with rank, like 5/6/7/8/9 projectiles or maybe something more generous like 5/8/11/14/17 to take into consideration teamfights in the mid to late game.

Thoughts? {{champion:157}}
